info.title: Poison Center Notification
info.description: This service writes data that is provided by an external application to the poison centre notification assessments in the Product Compliance solution in SAP S/4HANA Cloud. It uses the provided data to create and release a version of poison centre notification assessments. In addition, the service can also read data of poison centre notification assessments and provides this data to an external application.

x-sap-shortText: Create and release, as well as validate poison centre notification assessment data using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Chemical Compliance Approval for Purchased Material and Supplier(31G)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/31G " Link To BP ")

[Assess Dangerous Goods for a Product(3FC)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3FC " Link To BP ")
[Manage Safety Data Sheets for Products(3VR)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3VR " Link To BP ")
[Request Regulatory Documentation from Service Provider(6AV)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6AV " Link To BP ")
